typeProperties.script:
source(output(
		TransactionID as string,
		CustomerID as string,
		MovieID as string,
		RentalDate as timestamp,
		ReturnDate as timestamp,
		RentalCost as double,
		LateFee as double,
		RewindFlag as boolean,
		CreatedDate as timestamp,
		UpdatedDate as timestamp
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false) ~> FourthCoffeeSourceFiles
source(output(
		TransactionID as string,
		CustomerID as string,
		MovieID as string,
		RentalDate as date 'yyyyMMdd',
		ReturnDate as date 'yyyyMMdd',
		RentalCost as double,
		LateFee as double,
		RewindFlag as boolean,
		CreatedDate as timestamp 'yyyy-MM-dd\'T\'HH:mm:ss.SSS\'Z\'',
		UpdatedDate as timestamp 'yyyy-MM-dd\'T\'HH:mm:ss.SSS\'Z\''
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false) ~> VanArsdaleSourceFiles
